actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Control Act of 1976 relating to Federal certification of local flood control projects.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Control Act of 1976 to repeal the termination date on procedures under which the Chief of the Corps of Engineers certifies that local flood control improvements are compatible with Federal projects under consideration.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Control Act of 1976 relating to Federal certification of local flood control projects.
